title: Understanding Traffic Sign Recognition Technology in Foggy Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic machine learning and computer vision concepts, foundational programming knowledge
context.additional_context: Social sector technology training program for professionals aged 40+, focusing on practical computer vision applications and autonomous vehicle safety systems

learning_goals: Learners can explain the principles of image quality enhancement technology (multi-scale residual network) in foggy environments.
Learners can apply performance evaluation metrics (Visibility Index, Realness Index) for traffic sign recognition systems to real-world cases.
Learners can submit project outcomes utilizing an end-to-end deep learning model for processing real foggy environment images.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
